queryParameters.name: Dedicated
queryParameters.description: Return only dedicated IPs if set to true. (all are returned by default).

endpoints.name: List IPs assigned to the specified domain

queryParameters.name: Begin
queryParameters.description: The beginning of the search time range. It can be specified as a string (see Date Format) or linux epoch seconds. Refer to Time Range for details.

queryParameters.name: End
queryParameters.description: The end of the search time range. It can be specified as a string (see Date Format) or linux epoch seconds. Refer to Time Range for details.

queryParameters.name: ascending
queryParameters.description: Defines the direction of the search time range and must be provided if the range end time is not specified. Can be either yes or no. Refer to Time Range for details.

queryParameters.name: event
queryParameters.description: An event type.

queryParameters.name: recipient
queryParameters.description: An email address of a particular recipient. Even though a message may be addressed to several recipients, delivery is tracked on per recipient basis and every event pertains to only one recipient.

queryParameters.name: list
queryParameters.description: The email address of a mailing list the message was originally sent to.

queryParameters.name: message-id
queryParameters.description: A Mailgun message id returned by the messages API.

queryParameters.name: subject
queryParameters.description: A subject line.

queryParameters.name: tags
queryParameters.description: User defined tags.

queryParameters.name: from
queryParameters.description: An email address mentioned in the from MIME header.

queryParameters.name: to
queryParameters.description: An email address mentioned in the to MIME header.

queryParameters.name: size
queryParameters.description: Message size.

queryParameters.name: severity
queryParameters.description: Temporary or Permanent. Used to filter events based on severity, if exists. (Currently failed events only).

queryParameters.name: Event
queryParameters.description: The type of the event.

queryParameters.name: Start
queryParameters.description: The starting time. Should be in RFC 2822#page-14 or unix epoch format. Default: 7 days from the current time.

queryParameters.name: End
queryParameters.description: The ending date. Should be in RFC 2822#page-14 or unix epoch time in seconds. Default: current time.

queryParameters.name: Resolution
queryParameters.description: Can be either hour, day or month. Default: day

queryParameters.name: Duration
queryParameters.description: Period of time with resolution encoded. See Duration for more info. If provided, overwrites the start date and resolution.

queryParameters.name: event
queryParameters.description: Name of the event to receive the stats for.

queryParameters.name: start-date
queryParameters.description: The date to receive the stats starting from. Should have ISO8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

endpoints.name: Get statistics for a given tag

queryParameters.name: Event
queryParameters.description: The type of the event.

queryParameters.name: Start
queryParameters.description: The starting time. Should be in RFC 2822#page-14 or unix epoch format. Default: 7 days from the current time.

queryParameters.name: End
queryParameters.description: The ending date. Should be in RFC 2822#page-14 or unix epoch time in seconds. Default: current time.

queryParameters.name: Resolution
queryParameters.description: Can be either hour, day or month. Default: day

queryParameters.name: Duration
queryParameters.description: Period of time with resolution encoded. See Duration for more info. If provided, overwrites the start date and resolution.

List email providers for a given domain
List devices for a given domain

pathParameters.name: address
pathParameters.description: A valid email address for the mailing list.

endpoints.name: list members in the given mailing list

pathParameters.name: address
pathParameters.description: A valid email address for the mailing list.

queryParameters.name: subscribed
queryParameters.description: yes to lists subscribed, no for unsubscribed, list all if not set.

pathParameters.name: address
pathParameters.description: A valid email address for the mailing list.
